radiographic_examinations.findings: a right parietal ventriculoperitoneal shunt terminating in the left lateral ventricle; bilateral ventricles were smaller than they had been on previous imaging studies
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: the bilateral ventricles were smaller than they had been on previous imaging studies

radiographic_examinations.findings: symmetric pulmonary edema and bilateral pleural effusions; scattered mildly enlarged mediastinal lymph nodes, measuring up to 1.4 cm in short-axis diameter

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: cholelithiasis with trace pericholecystic fluid and mild gallbladder-wall thickening
